answers.answer: you must first select a liver transplant program and start an evaluation.  they will start the education process.  check with your insurance company about centers of excellence near where you live.  maintain your nutrition in the interim.

question: hello:i have hepatis c cirrohis of the liver,breast cancer,copd and diabetes i'm fighting to live.I can't start the treatment for the hep.c because of all the other things i have going on, i believe i'll be needing a liver transplant. can you tell me how do i go about preparing myself so when & if that time comes i'll be near or at the front of the list.
title: How to go about getting on the list for a liver transplant?
